ygData.subject: How to and what to solo?
ygData.msgSnippet: I hit level 30, and have found exp very slow in a steady group, especially if you die once a day (as I do) you end up at getting about 1/4 a bubble a day.
ygData.messageBody:
I hit level 30, and have found exp very slow in a steady group, especially
if you die once a day (as I do) you end up at getting about 1/4 a bubble a
day. Soloing seems to be the only answer for the time being, but i'm having
extreme trouble doing it, without sow/jboots. Root will usually work, but
either for a second, or for one blast, which still gives it time to kill me.
Bonds of force is also the same way. Any suggeston on a good way to solo, or
on something that has EXTREMELY low magic resistance would be nice. Thank
you.
